text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r05_quatrain r06_line r07_phr

LMNL.text: Straight remnant of the spiry birchen bough,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r05_quatrain
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r05_quatrain r08_phr r09_line

LMNL.text: That over the streamlet wont perchance to quake

r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r05_quatrain r12_line r13_phr

LMNL.text: Beheld thy white rind dancing on the lake —

LMNL.text: I fare with many a sigh

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r27_sestet r28_s r29_quatrain
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r27_sestet r28_s r29_quatrain r33_line r34_phr

LMNL.text: And meditating then on times long past,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r27_sestet r28_s r29_quatrain
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r27_sestet r28_s r29_quatrain r35_line r36_phr

r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r27_sestet r28_s r29_quatrain r39_line r40_phr

LMNL.text: As all beside the floor-soiled pail thou art cast;

LMNL.text: Turn on the twistings of this troublous world.
